document_data.name: Net of Shadows
document_data.mainbody: '''''Net of shadows''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: With this spell, a caster could blind a creature by using ordinary shadows. The shadows flew to the creature and wrapped them in a net of darkness. Within this net, the creature was unable to see anything beyond {{SI|5|ft}}. [[Darkvision]] was rendered useless. Additionally, the creature was disoriented while within the net. The net of shadow did not hinder the creature's movement.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
